page.title: 06Employment in Thornton Area
page.content: {Employment.}There are two main job areas, agriculture and tourism. {Agriculture}includes horticulture and forestry. Many jobs are related to agriculture e.g. animal feeds (Burgess Mill)farm vehicles and farm to freezer stores.The Forestry Commission has its offices on the edge of Pickering and there are a few flower nurseries. {Tourism.}These jobs tend to be seasonal,and include jobs in cafes, shops and a few hotels. Many teenagers earn pocket-money working on Saturdays and during the Summer holidays. The Old People's home at the Hall employs about 30 people and each of the 3 garages about 5. There is little{unemployment}and no large scale building development.
